thread.title: adidas Consortium & Titolo’s NMD_XR1 Trail Is Inspired By Pristine Alpine Snow
thread.title_full: adidas Consortium & Titolo’s NMD_XR1 Trail Is Inspired By Pristine Alpine Snow

author: Daniel Pearson
title: adidas Consortium & Titolo’s NMD_XR1 Trail Is Inspired By Pristine Alpine Snow
text:
Visit the original post to see all 5 images from this gallery. 
Brand : adidas Consortium x Titolo
Model : NMD_XR1 Trail
Key Features : The “Celestial” colorway is inspired by the snowy and mountainous landscapes surrounding Titolo’s stores in Zurich, Bern and Basel. The one-tone pristine white color is plastered across a loose gauge pattern on the sneaker’s Primeknit upper and perforated leather details, while the asymmetric overlay resembles a snow coated ridge in the sunlight.
Release Date : March 18
Price : No word on pricing as of yet, but you can expect it to be in the region of $130-$200.
Availability : Titolo 
Editor’s Notes : It’s easy to get bored and apathetic about the seemingly never-ending stream of new NMDs , but then along comes something like this to remind you of the greatness of the silhouette. adidas Consortium and Titolo have done a superb job on the NMD_XR1 Trail, succeeding in distilling the most epic elements of nature into a stunning sneaker.
